pitakotuwa podu welendapolata paminena lori ratha himi wyaparikayin kollakama sandaha yamata thriroda ratha dekak kollaka siw denekugen yuth kandayamak rupiyal delaksha panas dahasaka ran aabharana samanga kalaniya gonawaladi athadanguwata gath bawa mirihana wishesha aparadha wimarshana anshaya kiyayi.kuli gamanak yana muwawen kottawa ha maharagama nagarawalin thriroda ratha riyaduran kandawagena pamina piliyandala ha arawwala pradeshawaladi pihi penwa maraniya tharjanaya kara owun palanda siti ran aabharana ha thriroda ratha kolla ka kandayama mowun bawa parikshanawaladi heli wi atha.sakakaruwan wiwidha aparadhawalata sambandhawa siragatha wi nidahaswa pamini aya bawath owun kollaka ran aabharana kadawatha, ganemulla pradeshawalata wikuna thibiyadi soya gath bawa polisiya kiyayi.basnahira palath dakuna bara niyojya polispathi daya samarawira sahakara polis adhikari (aparadha) nishantha soyisa, nugegoda kottasa bhara polis adhikari deshabandu thennakon mahathwarunge adhikshanaya yatathe mirihana wishesha aparadha meheyum eekakaye sthanadhipathi pradhana polis parikshaka janaka kumara, upa polis parikshaka perera, hemantha polis sarayan (28415) lakshman mahathwaru parikshana pawathwathi..
